Submodules¶

medis.params module¶

This is the main configuration file. It contains default global variables (as in they are read in by the relevant modules) that define the parameters of the whole telescope system. These parameters can be redefined at the beginning of the example module the user is running

class medis.params.Astro_params¶

Bases: object

Default parameters for the astronomical system under investigation

exposure_time, startframe and numframes may seem a bit out of place here. Perhaps this class could be renamed

class medis.params.CAOS_params¶

Bases: object

#TODO make redundant with new atmosphere model Default parameters for the atmosphere

class medis.params.Device_params¶

Bases: object

This is different from MKID_params in that it contains an instance of these random multidimensional parameters

Perhaps it could be part of MKID_params

class medis.params.FPWFS_params¶

Bases: object

Replaces the role of M. Bottom’s Config file for speckle_killer_v3

class medis.params.H2RG_params¶

Bases: object

class medis.params.Simulation_params¶

Bases: object

Default parameters for outputs of the simulation. What plots you want to see etc

class medis.params.Telescope_params¶

Bases: object

This contains most of the parameters you will probably modify when running tests
